column4: hi can someone tell me which source i would need to add to see if i can get later versions of apps, eg vlc/python betas etc
The proposed repository is the closest thing to what you are requesting.  Ubuntu is not a rolling release like Debian is.
I'm not sure, but I know its in Gnomes, system>adminsitration>software sources
Probably from Python, or someone who builds binaries from their vcs
